itunes:summary:
The Raising Boys & Girls podcast is bringing you Intentional Conversations from parents and experts in the trenches! Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they visit with award-winning Christian artist, Michael W. Smith and his wife, Debbie on raising kids and grandkids by God's grace.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at https://www.gominno.com/parents/rbg-podcast-debbie-michael-w-smith-interview/

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com
